text: The 2008 African Women's Handball Championship was the 18th edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Angola from 8 to 17 January 2008. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 2009 World Women's Handball Championship and the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC+1). ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ;5–8th place bracket ===5–8th place semifinals=== \---- ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== Angola qualified also for the 2008 Summer Olympics and the Ivory Coast and Congo participated at a 2008 Summer Olympics qualification tournament. {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2009 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |- |align=center|8|| |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player: ;All-star team: * * * * * * * ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2008 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:2008 in African handball Category:January 2008 sports events in Africa Category:Women's handball in Angola
